Reference Title: Advisory Org. Circular:
Filing Status Changed: 03/27/2024
State Status Changed: 03/06/2024 Deemer Date:
Created By: Iyesha Strowder Submitted By: Margaret West
Corresponding Filing Tracking Number: GECC-133917326
Filing Description:
Re:Government Employees Insurance Company (GE)NAIC#: 031-22063
GEICO General Insurance Company (GG) NAIC#: 031-35882
GEICO Indemnity Company (GI)NAIC#: 031-22055
Automobile Casualty Manual – Rate/Rule Revision
File No.: 2023-667A
Dear Commissioner King:
For your review and acknowledgement, the above referenced companies herewith submit a revision to our Automobile
Casualty Manuals currently on file with your department.
Specifically, the above referenced companies propose a premium neutral change. Additionally, we are revising the Private
Passenger Rules for the companies referenced above.
Details and justification for the changes set forth are set forth in the attached filing memorandum and exhibits.
Revied manual pages are enclosed for your convenience.
Once you have had an opportunity to review the enclosed, please forward your acknowledgement. We will implement these
revisions for all new business policies effective on and after March 07, 2024 and all renewal policies effective on and after April
22, 2024.
Sincerely,
Joseph Termini
Senior Counsel
(478) 262-4080
Email: JTermini@geico.com
Enclosures
Filing Contact Information
Iyesha Strowder, Istrowder@geico.com

Objection Letter
Objection Letter Status Failure to Follow Instructions
Objection Letter Date 03/05/2024
Submitted Date 03/05/2024
Respond By Date 03/06/2024
Dear Iyesha Strowder,
Introduction:
Please respond to the following:
Are there caps on the maximums?
Conclusion:
If you have any questions you may contact me directly.
PLEASE DO NOT RESPOND BY A NOTE TO REVIEWER.
Sincerely,
Danny Floyd

Response Letter
Response Letter Status Submitted to State
Response Letter Date 03/05/2024
Submitted Date 03/05/2024
Dear Danny Floyd,
Introduction:
Thank you for your continued review of our filing.
The following is in response to your Objection inquiry on 03/05/2024.
Response 1
Comments:
The change is capped at 20%.
Changed Items:
No Form Schedule items changed.
No Rate/Rule Schedule items changed.
No Supporting Documents changed.
Conclusion:
Based on this additional information, we would appreciate your further consideration of our request.
Sincerely,
Iyesha Strowder
SERFF Tracking #: GECC-133917322 State Tracking #: Company Tracking #: 2023-667A

Amendment Letter
Submitted Date:
 
03/25/2024
Comments:Thank you for acknowledging our request to reopen our closed filing.We have attached our updated manual pages with revised effective dates. Base rates were revised to reflect that we will implement this filing before SERFF Tracking #:GECC-133801223. Our filing remains rate neutral.Upon final review, please forward your acknowledgement of our request.Changed Items:
No Form Schedule Items Changed.

Last Edited By:

Submitted On:
03/15/2024 02:25 PM
Subject:
Request to Reopen - Effective Date Change
Comments:
Thank you for your acknowledgement of our filing.
We will implement this revision for all new business effective on or after 04/04/2025 and all renewals effective on or after
05/19/2024. We request that you re-open our filing so that we may provide final printed copies of our manual pages reflecting
the new effective dates.
A Post Submission Update is provided.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused your Department.
Upon completion of your review, please forward your acknowledgement for our records.
